name: explorable
description: Using markdown and react to create explorable explanations

scripts.build: npm run compile && rm -rf dist && webpack -p
scripts.deploy: git add -f dist && git commit -m 'deploy' && git push origin `git subtree split --prefix dist master`:gh-pages --force && git rm -r dist && git commit -m 'cleanup deploy'
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run deploy
